Question: Which of the following is the appropriate order of the six phases in the SDLC (Software Development Life Cycle) model?

Choices.a: Requirements Analysis > Design > Programming > Deployment > Testing > Maintenance
Choices.b: Requirements Analysis > Design > Programming > Testing > Deployment > Maintenance
Choices.c: Requirements Analysis > Design > Testing > Programming > Deployment > Maintenance
Choices.d: Requirements Analysis > Testing > Design > Programming > Deployment > Maintenance

Question: The activities and milestones of a project are shown in the arrow diagram below. Which of the following is an appropriate description of the effect if the duration of activity B is increased by 5 days?

Choices.a: The earliest start time of activity G is delayed by 5 days.
Choices.b: The latest start time of activity F is delayed by 5 days.
Choices.c: The project’s completion time is delayed by 5 days.
Choices.d: The project’s minimum completion time is increased by 5 days.
